questions.question: What tool do you have for school that helps you remember your assignments.

choices.answer: Agenda
Books
Homework
Teachers

questions.question: How should you handle large assignments?

choices.answer: Do the whole thing at one time.
Copy and paste from the internet or someone else.
Do the assignment the night before it is due.
Break it down into smaller parts.

questions.question: When your teacher give you back your graded work, what should you do with it?

choices.answer: Throw it away.
Put it in a folder or binder.
Throw it into your book bag or locker.
Fold it up and put it in your pocket.

questions.question: What does prioritizing your homework mean?

choices.answer: Rewriting everything neatly.
Ignoring your homework.
Doing assignments in the order that they are due.
Only doing the homework assignments you want to do.

questions.question: What is the main reason it is important to keep your notebooks and folders organized?

choices.answer: To keep your teachers and parents from complaining.
To make sure you can find your work.
To make sure you don't seem messy to others.
Because you like it that way.
Knowing that you have homework.
Having homework every night.
Getting homework answers from your friends.
When and where you do your homework.

questions.question: What is a good way to remember the work you need to do?

choices.answer: Write it in your agenda
Write it on your hand.
Text your mom and tell her to remind you.
Call your friend every night and ask about the homework.

questions.question: What is a good way to keep track of your school supplies?

choices.answer: Keep them in a case or specific pocket in your bookbag.
Give them to you teacher to keep for you.
Throw them in your locker.
Carry them in your pocket.

questions.question: What is the best way to avoid rushing or being late in the morning?

choices.answer: Roll out of bed and get your stuff together.
Depend on your parents to get you stuff ready for you.
Go to school without having any of your stuff.
Get all your stuff together at night.

questions.question: A checklist is a good way to keep track of what?

choices.answer: Remember the stuff you have to do.
Know what you have completed.
What is due and when
All the above
